p: R. damascena Mill were collected from Meymand (Fars Province, Iran) during April 2017. It was authenticated (voucher no. MPPRC-99-1) by Dr. MR. Moein and deposited in the Museum of Medicinal Plants, Department of Pharmacognosy, Shiraz University of Medical Sciences, Shiraz, Iran. Residual water was collected during hydrodistillation of R. damascena flowers during April-May 2017 in Meymand (Fars Province, Iran).
